backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor and all core data models for tasks, users, transactions, ads, ratings, and activity logging.
backend/migration.mo: Contains migration logic that upgrades stored user roles by adding the new Business role while preserving existing data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to modified files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one-line summaries for key frontend files used across the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and themes including light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry document that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/.nojekyll: Prevents GitHub Pages from applying Jekyll processing to the public folder.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects unknown routes to root while preserving the original path.
frontend/scripts/README.md: Explains the purpose and usage of the draft URL verification script.
frontend/scripts/verify-draft-url.exampl: Example environment file showing how to configure a draft URL for verification.
frontend/scripts/verify-draft-url.mjs: Node script that verifies deployed draft URLs by checking HTTP responses, HTML structure, and deep link handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the root component and configures all app routes, handling authentication state and role-based redirection.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdInterstiti: Displays an interstitial ad with a countdown timer before allowing the user to continue.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdPlacementB: Shows a banner-style ad placement for a given ad type once loaded.
Provides the main layout with role-based navigation, user menu, and routing outlet.
frontend/src/components/tasks/PostedByLa: Fetches and displays the provider’s name for a task, falling back to a truncated ID if unavailable.
frontend/src/components/tasks/StatusBadg: Renders a color-coded badge representing the task’s current status.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskCard.t: Displays a task summary with status, details, provider info, and an optional accept button for students.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Tra: Shows a table of financial transactions with formatted dates, amounts, and type indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication with AuthClient, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, task, verification, withdrawal, and ad data via the actor API with identity integration and toasts.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, spacing, and UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/ActivityLogsPag: Displays a table of system activity logs with admin-only access, formatting timestamps and action labels.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows admin dashboard stats including verifications, tasks, withdrawals, and commission totals with quick navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdsSettingsPage: Admin page for viewing and editing ad placements, allowing updates to ad content and frequency with role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AllUsersPage.ts: Admin-only page that checks user role and displays a placeholder card for future user management features.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/CommissionEarni: Admin-only page showing platform commission info and a placeholder section for detailed earnings analytics.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/SystemStatsPage: Admin-only dashboard page that will display system performance metrics and analytics.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/TaskCompletionP: Loads all tasks awaiting proof review and lets admins approve or reject them, with payment distribution logic.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/TaskModerationP: Displays tasks pending approval and allows admins to approve them, with a future option for rejection.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/VerificationRev: Lists pending student verification requests and allows admins to approve or reject each with document review.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/WithdrawalReque: Shows pending withdrawal requests and lets admins approve or reject them with wallet deduction handling.
Renders the authentication landing page with Internet Identity login and a profile setup dialog for new users.
frontend/src/pages/Provider/CreateTaskPa: Provides a form for task posters and businesses to create tasks, validating deposit balance before submission.
frontend/src/pages/Provider/ProviderDash: Displays provider stats, tasks, deposit management, and transaction history with navigation to create new tasks.
frontend/src/pages/Student/MyTasksPage.t: Shows a student's active and completed tasks filtered from all tasks, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/Student/StudentDashbo: Displays student stats and lists available tasks, along with wallet info and dashboard ads.
frontend/src/pages/Student/StudentProfil: Allows students to view and edit profile details and shows wallet balance and role information.
frontend/src/pages/Student/TransactionHi: Displays a student's transaction history using a query hook and shows a loading card or a transactions table.
frontend/src/pages/Student/WalletPage.ts: Shows wallet balance, allows submitting withdrawal requests with validation, and lists recent transactions.
frontend/src/pages/Tasks/TaskDetailsPage: Loads and displays task details, handles accepting tasks, uploading proof, and admin review actions with progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/formatInr.ts: Formats numbers or bigints into INR strings and safely converts bigint to number for UI display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, architecture constraints, feature requirements, and upgrade guidelines for the system.
